key_takeaways: Solution: Use Cursor AI with Xcode to generate Swift code for iOS apps (Difficulty: beginner)
Solution: Use iOS local file storage instead of external databases (Difficulty: beginner)

AI Workflow: AI-Powered iOS App Development
Strategy: Use AI tools to prototype first, then learn coding through building rather than traditional learning
